products.name: Greek salad
products.description: The famous Greek salad of crispy lettuce, peppers, olives and our Chicago style feta cheese, garnished with crunchy garlic and rosemary croutons.

products.name: Bruschetta
products.description: Our Bruschetta is made from grilled bread that has been smeared with garlic and seasoned with salt and olive oil.

products.name: Lemon Dessert
products.description: This comes straight from grandma's recipe book, every last ingredient has been sourced and is as authentic as can be imagined.
